column5: was out today in the wind ,snow and early rain. a few boats further out reporting some huge jumbos,15's ,,heard  .on shore we got a consistant bite of 8 to 10 in.males. took 20 home for supper .been a while for fresh perch!!
Awesome waterwolf Nothing like a good feed of perch!!! Leechman
MMMMM Gotta love them Perch, Good to see you had a nice day out.
a great snack for a group of 4 guys .what a blast catching them!! jumbos should be in soon!  cheers.
